lines.text:
[on the phone to JoAnn]
Your children are very safe, where you'll never see them again.
You think moving to Regina makes you safe?

[to Garry Anderson on how to deal with police]
You just have to remember it's always deny, deny, deny.

[exasperated at his failed attempts to crack Thatcher's resolve]
You've taken DENY, DENY, DENY to whole new heights, haven't you?
I'm sorry you're not getting the answers you're looking for.
You're not sorry! You're just evasive!
